attributes.action: Classify alcoholic drinks (with over 12% alcohol) as a Class A drug.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Alcohol is clearly more dangerous than Cannabis which is now classified as a Class B drug.

This has been scientifically PROVEN time and time again.

Prohibition doesn't work! It only puts money in the hands of DANGEROUS CRIMINALS.

People that die every year in England & Wales from consuming drugs:

Tobacco         = 85,000,
Alcohol         = 6,627,
Heroin          = 842,
Paracetamol     = 466,
Antidepressants = 401,
Methadone       = 220,
Benzodiazepines = 190,
Cocaine         = 176,
Amphetamines    = 103,
MDMA/Ecstasy    = 58,
Barbiturates    = 14,
Cannabis        = 0 (ZERO)

Cannabis is one of the safest know drugs to man, Smoke inhalation is bad for you, users know that.I believe that it is a personal choice how you consume cannabis, Eating it has been proven to be non-lethal, IT TAKES AROUND 70KG CONSUMED ORALLY TO KILL AN AVERAGE PERSON, THUS MAKING IT IMPOSSIBLE.

As for all other "adverse effects", Yes smoking excessive amounts of cannabis can make you feel down, But claims of schizophrenia are UNPROVEN AFTER 100 YEARS, THEY ARE LIES, BRAIN DAMAGE? LIES!

CANNABIS IS LESS TOXIC THAN TOBACCO.

LEGALIZE IT AND REDUCE FUNDING FOR CRIMINALS, MAKE BRITAIN SAFER AND HAPPIER!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
